jchess.gamelogic.controllers.chessboardcontrollers

Class TwoPlayerChessboardController

  • java.lang.Object
    • jchess.gamelogic.controllers.chessboardcontrollers.RegularChessboardController
      • jchess.gamelogic.controllers.chessboardcontrollers.TwoPlayerChessboardController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IChessboardController, LoadSaveable

    public class TwoPlayerChessboardController
extends RegularChessboardController
    Class to represent chessgetBoard(). Chessboard is made from squares. It is setting the squers of chessboard and sets the pieces(pawns) witch the owner is current player on it.
